sections.heading: jurisdiction; scope.A judgment rendered or final order made by the district court may be reversed, vacated, or modified for errors appearing on the record
provides that certain orders are appealable, but it is not exclusive. Edquist v. Commercial Sav. & Loan Assn., 191 Neb. 618, 217 N.W.2d 82 (1974).
